## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install KhazadDum in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure KhazadDum package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to KhazadDum
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/tripathysagar/KhazadDum):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/tripathysagar/KhazadDum.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/tripathysagar/KhazadDum)

``` sh
$ conda install -c tripathysagar KhazadDum
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/KhazadDum/)

``` sh
$ pip install KhazadDum
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/tripathysagar/KhazadDum)’s
[pages](https://tripathysagar.github.io/KhazadDum/). Additionally you
can find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/tripathysagar/KhazadDum) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/KhazadDum/) respectively.
